body_text:
Hi Team

Kindly help with the product launch creative of Oppo || K13 Turbo

- Product KV
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- SBI , IDFC,BOB, Federal, DBS
*- Construct to be shared on Sunday ( 10 August 25) *
- 1st to 31st Aug
- Whatsapp+ Screensaver

*Please note since the construct will be live on sunday , would need to
block bandwidth of someone from the team for the same.

*May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes
you smile! ?*

*Vanshika Khurana*


On Thu, Aug 7, 2025 at 9:45 PM Design Team <
support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:

> Dear Vanshika Khurana,
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you
> a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit

>
> Thank you for your patience.
>
> Sincerely,

body:
Hi Team

Kindly help with the product launch creative of Oppo || K13 Turbo

- Product KV
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- SBI , IDFC,BOB, Federal, DBS
- Construct to be shared on Sunday ( 10 August 25)
- 1st to 31st Aug
- Whatsapp+ Screensaver 

*Please note since the construct will be live on sunday , would need to block bandwidth of someone from the team for the same. 

May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes you smile! 🌻

Vanshika Khurana


On Thu, Aug 7, 2025 at 9:45 PM Design Team <support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:
Dear Vanshika Khurana,

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/26619

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
Design Team _ Brand Marketing Support Team

body_text:
Hi Swati,

As discussed, we have received the offer, please find the changes to do :
1.up to Rs. 1000 Cashback
2.Remove the words 'credit &' in offer band
3.Add Kotak bank logo
4.Need to add a word 'Pay by link' in the headline - Will confirm shortly
post checking with Zeeshan



Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.

Hi Swati,

As discussed, we have received the offer, please find the changes to do :
1.up to Rs. 1000 Cashback
2.Remove the words 'credit &' in offer band
3.Add Kotak bank logo
4.Need to add a word 'Pay by link' in the headline - Will confirm shortly post checking with Zeeshan



Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.
